original_text: But some of the people did not listen to Moses. They kept part of the food until the morning. But worms appeared in it, and it began to have a bad smell. Then Moses was angry with those people.
korean_text: 그들이 모세에게 순종하지 아니하고 더러는 아침까지 두었더니 벌레가 생기고 냄새가 난지라 모세가 그들에게 노하니라

sentences.original_text: But some of the people did not listen to Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어떤 사람들은 모세의 말을 듣지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They kept part of the food until the morning
and it began to have a bad smell
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 나쁜 냄새가 나기 시작했다

sentences.original_text: Then Moses was angry with those people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세는 그 사람들에게 화가 났다
